articles.author: Ankika Biswas, Lisa Mattackal, Saeed Azhar
articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq post record closing highs as data stokes hope for rate cut - Reuters
articles.description: The S&P 500 index and technology-laden Nasdaq rose on Wednesday to post record high closes, as data pointing to a softening economy raised hopes the Federal Reserve could cut interest rates in September.

articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Meta ordered to stop training its AI on Brazilian personal data - The Verge
articles.description: Brazil’s data protection authority has banned Meta from training its AI models on images and other personal data from Brazilian Facebook and Instagram accounts.
